title: Implement highlighted field support
description: Implement support for highlighting in QueryBuilder and SearchResults

comments.author: Jeff Rodenburg
comments.content:
Support for highlighted implemented in new classes and structure.

Please see the source code at http://solrstuff.org/svn/solrsharp or download the source as of 08/22/2007 from the links at https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/SOLR-205.
